backend/main.mo: Main actor defining parcel, trip, rating, and user profile types with storage maps, access control, and sign‑up/profile management logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to include new phone number and government ID address fields while preserving other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test references for recent UI and interaction updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend React components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the Parcel Wala frontend and loading the main React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component managing authentication, profile setup flow, tab routing, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header component showing brand logo and optional back button using navigation context.
frontend/src/components/browse/Insurance: Checkbox filter toggling whether only insured listings are shown.
frontend/src/components/browse/RouteSear: Search bar for entering from/to cities with swap and quick‑select popular routes.
frontend/src/components/browse/TravelMod: Dropdown for selecting travel mode or all modes using predefined Mode values.
frontend/src/components/browse/VerifiedO: Checkbox filter restricting results to verified users only.
frontend/src/components/cards/ParcelCard: Displays parcel info such as category, route, date, price, and insurance based on deserialized data.
frontend/src/components/cards/TripCard.t: Renders trip info with travel mode, verification, pricing, route, and details specific to train, flight, or bus trips.
Chat thread view showing messages for a thread and allowing the user to send new messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: List of conversations with last message preview and unread counts, enabling thread selection.
frontend/src/components/insurance/Insura: A dropdown component for selecting insurance tier, showing pricing and benefits based on travel mode.
frontend/src/components/loading/Skeleton: Displays a pulsing skeleton card placeholder for loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login button using Internet Identity and shows loading or hides itself when already authenticated if loginOnly is true.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabs.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with tab icons, highlighting active tab and showing unread badges for chat and notifications.
frontend/src/components/motion/AnimatedS: Handles fade transitions when content changes based on a swap key.
frontend/src/components/motion/AnimatedT: Animates tab content sliding transitions with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/pricing/PriceCal: UI card for configuring shipment parameters and calculating price, with apply callback.
frontend/src/components/profile/verifica: Bottom sheet flow for email OTP verification with email entry, OTP input, resend, and validation actions.
Multi-step sheet for uploading, reviewing, and confirming government ID verification with upload progress.
Bottom-sheet UI for entering a phone number, receiving an OTP, and verifying it using the actor API.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Dashboard listing verification steps with buttons to trigger phone, email, and ID verification flows.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects a user's name and saves a basic profile, showing success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/SignUpModal.tsx: Sign‑up modal collecting name, phone, and address, submitting via mutation and handling duplicate‑account errors.
frontend/src/components/tracking/TrackAc: Renders action buttons for map navigation, route viewing, and sharing a live tracking link.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tracked: Simple picker component allowing the user to select a predefined delivery item to track.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Trackin: Displays a vertical timeline of tracking events with status, location, timestamps, and coordinates.
frontend/src/components/trips/TravelMode: Shows a colored badge with an icon and label representing the selected travel mode.
Select dropdown for choosing a travel mode, emitting the chosen Mode value.
frontend/src/components/trips/TripModeDe: Conditionally renders detailed form fields for car, bus, train, or flight travel info based on selected mode.
frontend/src/components/trips/Verificati: Shows verification badges (vehicle, ticket, PNR, flight) depending on trip detail verification flags.
Provides navigation history, back handling, and transient back handler support across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: LocalStorage‑based chat hook storing conversations, messages, and enabling message sending.
frontend/src/hooks/useEarnings.ts: Manages earnings transactions and withdrawals using LocalStorage, exposing totals and balances.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages notification list in localStorage with helpers to mark single or all notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfilePhoto.ts: Handles loading, updating, and clearing a user profile photo using localStorage and object URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, parcels, trips, and related mutations using an ICP actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTabScrollRestorati: Stores and restores scroll positions for each tab using refs and callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useTracking.ts: Simulates parcel tracking data with periodic GPS updates and persists a selected item in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark themes, custom color variables, and motion-reduction utilities.
frontend/src/layouts/MobileAppLayout.tsx: Mobile layout with tab navigation, scroll restoration, animated transitions, and background styling.
frontend/src/lib/domain/insurance.ts: Defines insurance tiers and returns coverage details based on selected tier and transport mode.
frontend/src/lib/domain/search.ts: Provides various filtering utilities for parcels and trips based on route, price, insurance, verification, and travel mode.
frontend/src/lib/domain/serialization.ts: Defines parcel and trip data formats and provides JSON serialize/deserialize helpers.
frontend/src/lib/pricing/priceCalculator: Computes parcel delivery price using distance, weight, mode, urgency, size, and other multipliers.
frontend/src/lib/share/shareTracking.ts: Shares a parcel tracking link using the Web Share API or falls back to copying the URL to the clipboard.
frontend/src/lib/tracking/navigationLink: Opens Google/Apple Maps for location search, routing, or navigation from the user’s current location.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Renders a login/signup prompt for users without access using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Displays parcel and trip listings with search filters for route, price, insurance, verification, and travel mode.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Shows a list of conversations or an active chat thread depending on user selection.
frontend/src/pages/EarningsPage.tsx: Shows total earnings, balance, and recent transactions with a withdrawal action.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard with navigation shortcuts and summary of active parcels and trips.
frontend/src/pages/MyListingsPage.tsx: Displays the user's parcels and trips, filtering by principal and allowing deletion with confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows a list of notifications with read/unread state and actions to mark items as read.
frontend/src/pages/OfferTripPage.tsx: Form for creating a trip with mode-specific details, validation, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders user profile info with photo upload, verification indicators, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/SendParcelPage.tsx: Form for posting a parcel with basic details, validation, and submission using default travel mode.
frontend/src/pages/TrackPage.tsx: Shows tracking details for a selected item with progress, location, route, actions, and history timeline.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, and animations with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including UI direction, architecture notes, known issues, required image edits, and feature list.
